metadata.glossary_type: Chinese Idioms and Special Expressions (成语、惯用语、歇后语、谚语)
metadata.description: 汉语熟语系统完整分类 - Comprehensive taxonomy of Chinese set phrases including chengyu, common expressions, allegorical sayings, and proverbs
sources: 汉程汉语 熟语大全
普宁市政府门户网站 '成语、谚语、歇后语、惯用语'
metadata.usage: Translation quality assessment, idiom verification, cultural adaptation, fluency evaluation

set_phrases.definition: 人们长期以来习惯使用的固定的词组或句子，具有基本固定的结构
set_phrases.definition_en: Fixed phrases or sentences with stable structures that have been habitually used by people for a long time
set_phrases.importance_for_translation: Essential for natural, idiomatic Chinese - literal translation often fails

definition.description: 汉字文化圈特有的固定短语，表达固定含义，多数由四个汉字组成
definition.description_en: Fixed phrases unique to Chinese character cultural sphere, expressing fixed meanings, mostly consisting of four characters

characteristics.structure: Most commonly 4 characters (四字格), occasionally 3, 5, or more
characteristics.meaning: Non-compositional - meaning not derivable from individual characters
characteristics.usage: Add sophistication and cultural depth to writing and speech
characteristics.learning_challenge: Must learn as whole units with historical/cultural context

historical_origin.meaning: Ruin something by adding unnecessary details
historical_origin.meaning_zh: 做多余的事，反而弄巧成拙
historical_origin.origin: 战国时期故事：画蛇比赛，有人画完蛇又给它添上脚，结果失败了
historical_origin.translation_note: Cannot translate literally; use equivalent like 'gild the lily' or explain

historical_origin.meaning: Wait for unexpected good fortune; foolish passivity
historical_origin.meaning_zh: 不劳而获的侥幸心理；死守经验不知变通
historical_origin.origin: 农夫等待兔子再次撞树的故事
人在船上掉了剑，在船上刻记号，船停后在刻痕处找剑

common_usage.meaning: Kill two birds with one stone
common_usage.meaning_zh: 做一件事得到两种好处
形容办事认真，连最细微的地方也不马虎
事情没做完就停止，不能坚持到底
比喻在关键地方加上一笔，使内容更加生动

philosophical.meaning_zh: 了解自己也了解对方（孙子兵法：知己知彼，百战不殆）

philosophical.meaning: Persistence pays off (lit. water drops penetrate stone)

philosophical.meaning_zh: 根据学生的能力和特点进行教育

examples: 马后炮 (mǎ hòu pào) - hindsight criticism
莫须有 (mò xū yǒu) - trumped-up charge
无风不起浪 (wú fēng bù qǐ làng) - no smoke without fire
一寸光阴一寸金 (yī cùn guāng yīn yī cùn jīn) - time is precious

translation_strategies.equivalent_idiom: Use English equivalent when exists ('kill two birds with one stone' for 一举两得)
translation_strategies.keep_chinese: Sometimes keep in Chinese with explanation for cultural effect

definition.description: 口语性较强的固定短语，具有引申意义，多为三字格
definition.description_en: Colloquial fixed phrases with extended meanings, typically in three-character format
characteristics: 简洁有力 - Concise and powerful

examples.meaning: Make things difficult for someone (petty revenge)
Be refused admittance, get the door slammed
Paper tiger (appears threatening but is ineffectual)

additional_examples.meaning: Hit a snag, meet with a rebuff

additional_examples.meaning_zh: 故意含糊其辞，欺骗蒙混

differences: 惯用语更口语化 - Guanyongyu more colloquial
成语更书面化 - Chengyu more literary
惯用语多为三字 - Guanyongyu typically 3 characters
成语多为四字 - Chengyu typically 4 characters
惯用语多动宾结构 - Guanyongyu often verb-object
成语结构多样 - Chengyu varied structures

definition.description: 由两部分组成的表达方式，前一部分是形象的比喻，后一部分是解释或说明
definition.description_en: Expressions structured in two parts with vivid imagery that can easily highlight the essence of content
definition.structure: 前半部分（比喻） + 后半部分（说明）
definition.usage: Often only first part spoken, second part implied

characteristics.humor: 幽默风趣 - Humorous and witty
characteristics.punchline: 类似谜语 - Like riddles with punchlines

homophone_type.wordplay: 照舅 (light for uncle) sounds like 照旧 (as before)

metaphor_type.meaning: Cannot even save oneself (let alone help others)

story_based.part2_pinyin: yī gè yuàn dǎ, yī gè yuàn ái
story_based.part2_meaning: one willing to beat, one willing to be beaten
story_based.meaning: Both parties willing (referring to a scheme)

story_based.pinyin: zhū gě liàng jiè dōng fēng

translation_challenge.difficulty: Very difficult to translate - relies on Chinese cultural knowledge, puns, metaphors
strategies: Find equivalent English saying if exists
Use footnote to explain cultural context
Sometimes just explain the meaning without attempting literal translation

definition.description: 在民众中间流传的通俗语句，言简意赅地总结生活经验或道理
definition.description_en: Popular statements circulated among people that concisely summarize life experiences or truths
characteristics: 简明扼要 - Concise and to the point

life_wisdom.pinyin: yī fēn gēng yún, yī fēn shōu huò
life_wisdom.literal: one part plowing, one part harvest
life_wisdom.meaning_zh: 付出多少努力，就会有多少回报
做得多了就会熟练灵巧

life_wisdom.pinyin: shī bài shì chéng gōng zhī mǔ
life_wisdom.meaning: Failure is the mother of success

life_wisdom.yanyu: 三个臭皮匠，顶个诸葛亮
life_wisdom.pinyin: sān gè chòu pí jiàng, dǐng gè zhū gě liàng
life_wisdom.literal: three stinky cobblers equal one Zhuge Liang
life_wisdom.meaning: Many heads are better than one

weather_agriculture.pinyin: yī chǎng qiū yǔ yī chǎng hán
weather_agriculture.meaning: Each autumn rain brings colder weather
weather_agriculture.meaning_zh: 秋天每下一次雨，天气就冷一些

social_relations.yanyu: 在家靠父母，出门靠朋友
social_relations.pinyin: zài jiā kào fù mǔ, chū mén kào péng you
social_relations.literal: at home rely on parents, outside rely on friends
social_relations.meaning: At home rely on parents, outside rely on friends
social_relations.meaning_zh: 在家里依靠父母，在外面要依靠朋友

social_relations.pinyin: yuǎn qīn bù rú jìn lín
social_relations.literal: distant relative not as good as near neighbor
social_relations.meaning: A near neighbor is better than a distant cousin
social_relations.meaning_zh: 邻居比远方的亲戚更能帮忙

differences: 谚语更通俗易懂 - Proverbs more accessible
成语更精炼典雅 - Chengyu more refined and elegant
谚语是完整句子 - Proverbs are complete sentences
成语多为短语 - Chengyu are phrases
谚语重在说理 - Proverbs focus on principles
成语重在表意 - Chengyu focus on meaning

challenges: 成语和惯用语难以直译 - Chengyu and guanyongyu hard to translate literally
文化背景知识必不可少 - Cultural background knowledge essential
找到对应表达不容易 - Finding equivalent expressions difficult
保持语言风格和语体 - Maintaining style and register
歇后语的双关和谐音无法对应 - Xiehouyu puns and homophones cannot be matched
best_practices: Use equivalent English idioms when available
Adapt to target audience's cultural knowledge
Consider whether to domesticate or foreignize

internet_slang_note.note: 现代汉语网络流行语有效期短（平均3-7个月），具有强烈的缩略、幽默、替换特征
internet_slang_note.note_en: Modern Chinese internet buzzwords have short lifespan (average 3-7 months), showing strong abbreviation, humor, and substitution characteristics
examples_2025: YYDS (永远的神 - eternal god - the GOAT)
XIMO (谐音笑模 - various meanings based on context)
internet_slang_note.caveat: 网络流行语变化快，需持续更新 - Internet slang changes rapidly, requires continuous updates
